title: The Origins of weather
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Joseph Koenig
brief_description: Illustrates, from the vantage of off-the-Earth observation, the factors that produce the climate we know. Animation shows the Earth’s dynamic heat exchange—the effect of the sun’s heat, the movement of air masses. Resulting weather is then shown.
